name: Infiltrator (itch) (RandomTrash, TimoxaZlobniy, NewPirateOfUaSeas, FentZZ, MrZuerg, FriendlyWithMeat)
name_original: Infiltrator (itch) (RandomTrash, TimoxaZlobniy, NewPirateOfUaSeas, FentZZ, MrZuerg, FriendlyWithMeat)
description:
Please note that this game is not really optimized and it takes up to 10 minutes to load the level

Made for the 7DFPS 2021 game jam in 7 days.

This is our first attempt at making a gamejam entry in team, and we haven't managed to finish everything we've planned for this game. We are planning to finish it though!

Made by:

  • Fentzz - 3d models
  • FriendlyWithMeat - code
  • MrZuerg - level design
  • NewPirateOfUASeas - code, sounds
  • rndtrash - code
  • TimoxaZlobniy - concept artist

Tools used:

  • Godot with Qodot
  • TrenchBroom
  • GIMP
  • Visual Studio Code
